Description of Asset: Form used to initiate the new starter process and sent to UNIT B via email.
At Origin (description): On PC of line manager, stored on network. For some line managers, they store these files on their laptop. Unlikely to be password protected.
If Information is Moved (description): Form is emailed to UNIT B using internal email system. It is then held on System A and System B by UNIT B.
